title: Khaos Engine
description: After sinking to new depths of criminal rule. The City of London sought assistance from one of the world's foremost intellectuals. Not to mention the country's richest and most powerful businessman. Now, the City is safe. The City is secure. The City is sure of itself. But while the City sleeps...(ISBN 1326022733 - Alternate Cover Edition)
author: D R Linton
